file_content.text: I bet I get a commendation for this.
Excuse me. I have work to do.
Well, if it isn't the best-paid engineering consultant on Balmorra.
Oh, my lord, I didn't realize--I mean, no one told me you would be Sith. My apologies for the familiarity.
But, um, if you don't mind me asking, what is someone like you doing working for Officer Sakoal?
I mean, no offense, but you don't exactly look like science corps material, you know?
What exactly is he paying you all this for?
How much is it worth for you to know about it?
You paying for that answer?
Only my duty.
Sure. The kind of servants who kill the master, then run a planetary takeover from his front porch.
Usually more of a choke-someone-to-death-with-your-mind kind of servant, though, right? No offense.
Usually more of a cut-people's-heads-off kind of servant, though, right? No offense.
Usually more of a skin-your-enemies-and-leave-their-bodies-to-die kind of servant, though, right?
Usually more of a garotte-you-in-the-name-of-Imperial-security kind of servant, though, right?
Sure. The kind of servants who'd kill the master, then run a planetary takeover from his front porch.
I hear things.
I can make it worth your while for dirt on how Officer Sakoal's been spending Troida money.
Just transfer the credits and don't ask things you don't want to know.
Back off.
Don't ask about things that could get Officer Sakoal in trouble, you mean? Because that's definitely something I want to know.
I could add a little something on top of this for information that lets me pass Officer Sakoal at the next evaluation.
Call it a tip. Fifteen percent.
Officer Sakoal hired me to kill his wife and her rebel boyfriend.
Pay me and I'll talk.
Pretty little Kelara had Republic leanings, hmm?
Ooh, that is not going to look good to the clearance board at all....
Thank you. Next time you see me, I may be working Troida instead of this pit.
Keep your credits. I'll just take what I'm owed.
I don't betray a trust.
Suit yourself. I'm sure I can find someone else who knows what Sakoal's up to.
I'm busy. My evaluation comes up day after tomorrow.
